alert.note: Alert for Davidson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 12:57PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Davidson County through 145 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near High Rock Lake, or 7 miles east of Salisbury, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Linwood, Denton, Gordontown, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, Nc Wildlife Access Boat Launch, High Rock Lake Marina & Campground, High Rock and High Rock Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rain can be expected due to the slow movement of this storm. Prolonged heavy rain will result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks and streams. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
